mutants.code:
def minimum_members_for_bill_passage(N, P, ballots):
    scores = [(100 - P) * w + P * b for (w, b) in ballots]
    scores.sort(reverse=True)
    score = -sum((b for (_, b) in ballots)) / P
    cnt = 0
    while score < 0:
        score += scores[cnt]
        cnt += 1
    return cnt
